attributes.action: Introduce 'Capital punishment' for the offence of terrorism.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: That convicted terrorists be considered for the death penalty, where their actions or the action of the group they represent has harmed a British Citizen or the United Kingdom in general.

rejection.details: This petion ovrlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=capital+punishment
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
